welcome.subtitle: Your Gateway to Luxury Automotive Excellence
welcome.description: At WeltCar, we specialize in providing the finest exclusive vehicles, ensuring luxury and sophistication in every drive. With our vast selection of top-tier cars, personalized service, and exclusive offers, we make your dream of owning a premium vehicle a reality. Experience the pinnacle of automotive excellence with WeltCar.
howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.luxury.title: Discover Luxury
howItWorks.luxury.description: Explore our curated collection of exclusive vehicles, each selected for its unparalleled quality and elegance. Begin your journey into luxury today
howItWorks.consultation.title: Personalized Consultation
howItWorks.consultation.description: Our expert consultants are dedicated to understanding your unique preferences and needs, providing tailored advice and support to help you find your perfect car
howItWorks.saving.title: Exclusive Savings
howItWorks.saving.description: Enjoy exclusive deals and savings on the most luxurious vehicles. At WeltCar, we make high-end car ownership accessible
whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Us?
whyChooseUs.description: At WeltCar, we pride ourselves on delivering exceptional service and exclusive access to the world’s finest cars. Our commitment to quality, personalized attention, and customer satisfaction sets us apart. Choose WeltCar for a seamless, luxurious car-buying experience.
joinOurNewsletter.title: Join Our Newsletter
joinOurNewsletter.stayUpdated.title: Stay Updated with WeltCar's Latest News
joinOurNewsletter.stayUpdated.descriptio: Sign up for our newsletter to receive exclusive insights and updates on the latest luxury cars and special promotions. Don’t miss out on the chance to be the first to know about our exciting offers and news.
joinOurNewsletter.subscribe.title: Subscribe Now and Never Miss a Deal
joinOurNewsletter.subscribe.description: Join our newsletter to stay informed and connected with the world of luxury automobiles. Be a part of our elite community and enjoy the benefits of being in the know.

about.description: At WeltCar, we are committed to delivering the ultimate luxury automotive experience. Our mission is to provide discerning clients with a curated selection of VIP vehicles, exceptional customer service, and exclusive benefits. With years of expertise in the high-end car market, we ensure that each interaction is tailored to meet your specific needs and desires. Discover a world where luxury meets excellence with WeltCar.
fastFacts.premiumVehicles.subtitle: Premium Vehicles Sold Annually
fastFacts.premiumVehicles.description: Our extensive inventory and expert sales team ensure that we meet the high demand for luxury cars, serving clients from all around the world.
fastFacts.repeatCustomers.subtitle: Repeat Customers
fastFacts.repeatCustomers.description: A significant majority of our clients return for their next luxury vehicle purchase, a testament to our exceptional service and the quality of our vehicles.
fastFacts.yearsExperience.subtitle: Years of Experience in the Luxury Auto Industry
fastFacts.yearsExperience.description: Our deep industry knowledge and long-standing relationships with top car manufacturers guarantee that you receive the best vehicles and services available.
favorites.nocars.title: You have no added the cars
team.title: Our Team
team.description: Our team at WeltCar is composed of industry experts dedicated to providing you with the best luxury car buying experience. We work together to ensure that every aspect of your interaction with us is seamless and satisfying, making your journey to owning a premium vehicle both enjoyable and memorable.
team.members.oleg.name: Oleg
team.members.natalia.name: Natalia
team.members.sergey.name: Sergey
team.members.alexander.name: Alexander
team.members.agassi.name: Agassi
partners.title: Our Partners
partners.carLogistics.title: Car Logistics
partners.carLogistics.description: We handle the logistics of cars, containers, and more, whether via auto transport or air freight. Let us take care of your logistics needs with precision and care.
partners.legalAssistance.title: Legal Assistance
partners.legalAssistance.description: Our legal experts are here to assist with all your business-related legal inquiries and issues. Reach out to us for professional support and reliable advice.
partners.itSupport.title: IT Support
partners.itSupport.description: We provide expert support in custom website and ERP development, ensuring your digital platforms run smoothly. Our team is ready to solve any technical challenges.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Whether you have questions about our vehicles, need assistance with your purchase, or want to learn more about our services, we are here to help. Reach out to us through any of the following methods:

findCar.title: Find Car
findCar.description: If you are looking for a specific car, please fill out the form, and our specialist will contact you to provide all the necessary information. We strive to make the process of searching for and purchasing a car as convenient as possible for you.
